message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a good chunk, but I'm worth more!
I'll give you a smaller share, but you can't have it all!
You're getting desperate, I'll take the majority!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm not going down without a fight!
You're getting close, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm not giving up, I'll take the majority now!
I'll take the majority, you're running out of options!
I'll give up, you win this time, but I'll be back!
